heroblade.release_notes:
- Radgame Tools Bink dependency removed.
- Compression level increased to maximum and protected with HMAC.
- Auto Window Scalable implemented.
- Oodle data protection enhanced with HeroProcess.
- Physx upgraded from 2.8.4.2 to 2.8.4.6.
- NXU_string has been removed at the instance level.
- NVAPI dependency has been updated.
- Boost version has been updated.
- Assimp headers have been removed from the project.
- Libcrypto and libssl have been updated.
- Granny has been completely updated from 2.9.7.0 to 2.118.0.
- Umbra dependency has been removed.
- Awesomium dependency has been removed.
- SQLCipher and SQLite amalgamation have been updated.
- OpenGL has been updated.
- zlib has been upgraded from version 1.2.3 to 1.3.1.
- FreeType headers have been updated and the DLG logging library has been added.
- Auto Dom feature has been added for LSE.
- A wrapper has been implemented between FMOD Studio and FMOD Ex to ensure backward compatibility.
- A new and functional Firestorm login screen has been added.
